Activate Viscera Seer by sacrificing the persist creature.
The sacrificed creature's persist ability triggers, returning it from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
The Great Henge triggers, putting a +1/+1 counter on the persist creature and causing you to draw a card.
The -1/-1 and +1/+1 counters are removed as a state-based action.
Resolve the ability from step 1.
Repeat.

Cast Replication Technique by paying {4}{U}, targeting Doubling Season.
Replication Technique's demonstrate ability triggers, causing you to copy it, with the copy targeting Doubling Season.
Resolve the copy of Replcation Technique, creating two token copies of Doubling Season.
Resolve the original Replication Technique, creating eight token copies of Doubling Season.
Create a creature token, causing you to instead create 2,048 creature tokens.
almostIncludedByAddingColors.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to create a creature token.

almostIncludedByAddingColors.description:
Cast Jace by paying {1}{U}{U}. Jace enters the battlefield with six loyalty counters due to Doubling Season
Activate Jace's third loyalty ability by removing five loyalty counters from it, creating four nonlegendary copies of Jace that enter the battlefield with six loyalty counters each due to Doubling Season.
Repeat step 2 using a Jace token.
